project-challenges: Video file storage on the cloud and on the phone, Android activity management, time management, running the app on every device successfully
project-future-plans: Multiple user functionality, better design, code clarity, better error reporting, testing environments, safer storage of video
project-inspiration: Snapchat stories, sharing short collaborative videos with friends
project-lessons-learned: Android development: File management, Project management (through git), Advanced video encoding, Parse (cloud based API), A bit of User Experience
project-accomplishments: Implementing the functionality, the cohesiveness of the individual components of the app
